sub_title: | Hobby Photographer | Car Crazy | Tech Geek
summary:
My motto: "Passion is the fuel for success" 

About me:
I have completed my Bachelor of International Business and Management Studies at the Hogeschool van Arnhem en Nijmegen (HAN University of Applied Sciences), in the Netherlands.

The first two years in the Netherlands built a strong foundation of international business knowledge, my third year took me to Germany for an internship and France for a study abroad. I have also carried out a research assignment for Wellman International located in the Netherlands, in order to broaden my horizons and put my skills into practice. My thesis was carried out at a UN affiliated training center, Antwerp-ITCCO, in which I conducted research and provided advice on how they could develop their marketing strategies for their various "Action Learning for Sustainability" training courses. 

I completed my primary and secondary education in Dubai, (U.A.E) After completing secondary school I took the opportunity to gain work experience in a small IT Consulting firm (Complease Consulting) which has a strong reputation for customer relations and quality. Due to the small size of the business I was able to gain real first hand experience into every day working life. I had many opportunities to try different areas during my time there involving data entry, managing project work flow, purchasing, meeting with clients to discuss issues and potential solutions and managing projects such as providing the infrastructure and support for an international news company at the Dubai Airshow.

certifications.name: “Triskelion” on Time Management and Personal Productivity

projects.title: 4th Year - International Business Expansion Plan
projects.description: Creation of an expansion plan for a fictional condom company (Zeus Corporation). Initially operating in Hungary and Romania, after conducting in depth research a plan was drawn up to enter the Ukrainian market.

profile_positions.description: Following the acquisition of CytoSMART Technologies B.V. by Axion BioSystems, Inc. I have been assigned the responsibility for managing the distribution of the Exact product line (cell counters) through major distribution channels in North America and EMEA.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager – Exact Series Distribution - NA/EMEA

profile_positions.description: I am responsible for building our business in the US Market as well as account management for one of our key distribution partners. Being a scale-up, I have held numerous responsibilities since 2016. I started out with developing outreach and management of clients in predominantly English-speaking regions, including North/South America, Oceania, the United Kingdom and the United Arab Emirates. In addition to my responsibilities in sales, we strive for Sales 2.0 - for this, I work side by side with the Marketing Department to provide real-world insight from customers and assist in the creation of resources such as product videos, official paperwork, sales templates and campaigns. I am fortunate at CytoSMART to have the freedom to use my skills in a number of areas and continue to develop as an "all-round" professional by having access to a number of situations/roles/responsibilities, software packages and growth opportunities.
profile_positions.title: International Sales Representative - US Territory Manager + Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
While working at Complease Consulting, I used the resources and information at hand to start improving my knowledge of online marketing. Several domains have been registered in order to go down different paths:

Main project:
Hobby/directory: Dubai Cruise Nights is my platform to combine my automotive enthusiasm with my education. I use this platform to showcase my hobby as well as learning about how to build a website, social media following and create a business directory specific to an industry.

Side projects that have been started but are waiting for some other aspects:
Online store: wwww.24sevenglobal.com
Startup consulting: www.NCV-concierge.com

These websites were created in order to boost my knowledge of social marketing, starting a small business, networking, sales and all related business aspects as they grow. I was also able to improve my knowledge of basic HTML, some photo editing, Wordpress and Prestashop website creation as well as working with various plugins. This also gave me an opportunity to delve into Social Marketing through Instagram, Twitter and Facebook by understanding how to use the analytics to best understand the target group, posting practices and more.
profile_positions.title: Creator and Owner

profile_positions.description: After graduation, I return to Dubai to assist the family business. The role requires contribution to in-house matters such as asset valuation and disposal if necessary, project research, various administrative aspects including purchasing and inventory management as well as aspects of business development. Since I have prior experience with Complease, it allowed me to begin immediately and put what I have studied into practice at a higher level, in order to assist the business through a transition period while helping provide solutions and support to existing customers, attending to in-house matters and using the tools available to improve my IT related skill set.
profile_positions.title: Office Manager

profile_positions.description:
The purpose of this position was to carry out market research for Antwerp-ITCCO (A UNITAR affiliated training centre) in order to help them develop the marketing strategy for their 'Action Learning for Sustainability' courses. The research included internal and external aspects in order to form a well rounded view of the current and desired situation and will provide conclusions, recommendations and an implementation plan for their new marketing strategy.

This thesis was also nominated for the 2014-2015 FEM Afstudeerprijs at the Hogeschool van Arnhem en Nijmegen. For more info, please visit: http://www.han.nl/gebied/economie-management-recht/~afstudeerprijs/nominaties/
profile_positions.title: Graduation Thesis - International Marketing Strategy Researcher

profile_positions.description: The task was to carry out research to deliver Wellman Recycling a viable solution to issues in specific areas. The research was comprised of primary and secondary data collection in addition to analysis, drawing conclusions, recommendations and providing an implementation plan.
profile_positions.title: Internal Strategic and Tactical level Research Project

profile_positions.description:
•	Comparing and summarizing rates sheets from competitors
•	Reviewing and updating various documents such as Terms & Conditions, Frequently Asked Questions, quotation responses and other day to day emails in English
•	Research for updating website airport database
•	Creation of a TAXI2AIRPORT YouTube video to advertise the training center and life in the Neuhuasen area, for new employees
•	Creation of a YouTube video to advertise the affiliate system, first in English, followed by all languages offered by TAXI2AIRPORT
•	Ad words campaign - research busiest airport list then summarize based on the country. Keep Adwords sheets up to date with new destinations and respective details to better target customers
•	Work on finding new agents/interns with Facebook/Linkedin and other online networks
•	Work on newsletter/twitter to update clients on new destinations offered as well as building a database of followers and interested potential partners
•	Assisting new employees with procedures in the absence of a supervisor or area manager
profile_positions.title: Marketing/Business Administration Intern

profile_positions.description:
I was given the opportunity to carry out an internship here after completing my secondary school in Dubai. The company has a very strong reputation for quality and customer service and is small in size. These characteristics gave me an excellent opportunity to try a number of different tasks and decide what I could potentially do in the future. I carried out a number of tasks during my time there, some of which are listed below:

- Managing Projects such as setting up the infrastructure for an international news team at the Dubai International Airshow in 2009
- Managing data entry and work flow in the Lotus Notes Suite
- Coordinating work flow and engineer visits by scheduling appointments with clients
- Creating various spreadsheets and maintaining databases related to inventory management
- Working on social media and learning the potential of online business through the use of their web development department
- Being in regular contact with clients to ensure that requirements are clear and are being met
- General tasks such as delivery and collection of engineers, hardware/software and payment collection.
profile_positions.title: Intern - Business Administration
